content: Dairy herd at Barn #2 produces ~28 liters/cow/day. Nutrition plan changed to a high-protein blend to boost butterfat.
metadata: Herd size: 60 Holsteins, Feed: ProMilk Elite

content: Free-range poultry on 2-week rotational grazing. Reduced parasite load and improved egg quality.
metadata: Flock ID: PR-55, weekly output: 400 eggs, next rotation: 2025-03-01

content: Goat herd introduced for brush control in upper pasture. Preliminary results show decreased invasive shrubs.
metadata: Herd size: 15 goats, daily movement: 1 acre/day

content: Cattle vaccination schedule updated. Next booster due for calves in mid-April.
metadata: Vaccine type: Bovine respiratory, recommended date: 2025-04-15

content: Hog feed plan includes a higher corn ratio for finishing hogs. Target weight: 250 lbs before summer.
metadata: Hog group: #7, feed ratio: 70% corn, 30% soybean meal
